title: WTT: My T205 Miller beater for your Sovereign beater

posts.post_title: WTT: My T205 Miller beater for your Sovereign beater
posts.post_content:
Anybody want to trade?  I've got more in my Dupes Box, so shoot me a PM if you're interested in unloading your Sovereign!

Take Care,
Geno
